title: Susan.Mohammad
text:
I’m a Process Transformation and Continuous Improvement professional with 7+ years of experience leading enterprise process optimization, automation, and risk-reduction initiatives across banking, fintech, retail, and technology environments.
I specialize in turning complex, manual, and ambiguous operations into scalable, data-driven, and efficient systems through process redesign, workflow automation, and analytics.
My work sits at the intersection of:

Process Improvement & Operational Excellence

Automation & Digital Transformation

Risk & Compliance Optimization

Data Analytics & KPI Reporting

Cross-functional Leadership & Change Management




I help teams and organizations:
✔ Streamline inefficient workflows
✔ Reduce operational and compliance risk
✔ Automate manual processes
✔ Implement scalable tools and systems
✔ Use data to drive better decisions
✔ Lead stakeholders through complex change




A few examples of outcomes I’ve delivered:

Reduced manual coordination effort by ~90% through workflow automation (Power Platform)
Increased operational productivity by 35–75% through process redesign initiatives
Built KPI dashboards enabling real-time performance visibility for leadership





My approach combines structured problem solving with practical execution:
Define → Measure → Analyze → Improve → Control (Lean Six Sigma / DMAIC)
I focus on: - understanding the root cause
- aligning stakeholders
- simplifying processes
- embedding automation
- delivering measurable, sustainable results




You can view examples of my projects here:

Transformation Projects – workflow automation & digital solutions

Risk & Compliance Optimization – enterprise process and control design

Analytics & Tools – dashboards, reporting, and technical implementations





Methods: Lean Six Sigma Black Belt, DMAIC, Process Mapping, RCSA
Tools: Power Platform, SharePoint, Power BI, Excel, SQL, R, GitHub, Quarto
Strengths: Stakeholder facilitation, executive communication, change leadership, data storytelling



I’m passionate about helping organizations solve operational problems and build smarter, more resilient processes.
My email address: susanmohammadk22@gmail.com

title: Projects
text: A selection of initiatives demonstrating process transformation, automation, and risk optimization.

title: Projects
text:
Authentication Process Automation
Problem
Manual onboarding created delays and high support workload.
Action
Applied DMAIC, redesigned workflow, automated validation inside the system.
Impact
Reduced cycle time, lowered support effort, improved customer experience.

title: Projects
text:
Survey Workflow Automation (Power Platform)
Problem
Manual surveys caused delays and inconsistent feedback collection.
Action
Built automated intake and distribution workflow using Power Apps + SharePoint.
Impact
~90% reduction in coordination effort and centralized analytics.

title: Projects
text:
SharePoint Performance Tracking System
Problem
Tracking in spreadsheets limited visibility and scalability.
Action
Migrated to SharePoint and built KPI dashboards.
Impact
Real-time monitoring and improved team productivity.

title: Projects
text:
Escheatment Process Transformation
Facilitated workshops, mapped AS-IS/TO-BE, identified risks, and embedded preventive controls.
Result: stronger governance and reduced compliance exposure.

title: Projects
text:
Restitution Process Redesign
Standardized workflows across teams and third parties, clarified ownership, and documented controls.
Result: improved audit readiness and operational consistency.

title: Projects
text:
RCSA Workshops
Led cross-functional risk assessments to proactively identify and mitigate operational risks.
Result: embedded controls directly into process design.

title: About Me
text: I bridge the gap between technical solutions and business outcomes by translating complex requirements into actionable strategies. My methodology combines:

title: About Me
text:
Structured Problem-Solving Framework
I apply hypothesis-driven analysis, DMAIC (Define, Measure, Analyze, Improve, Control), and Lean Six Sigma principles to systematically deconstruct ambiguous problems and identify root causes.

title: About Me
text:
Data-Informed Decision Making
I leverage analytics reports to move beyond intuition, creating evidence-based recommendations that align with strategic business objectives.

title: About Me
text:
Change Leadership
I design adoption strategies that address both technical implementation and human factors, ensuring sustainable transformation through stakeholder engagement and targeted communication.

title: About Me
text:
Technical Toolkit

Process Optimization: Lean Six Sigma Black Belt, Process Mapping, Value Stream Analysis
Automation & Technology: Power Platform (Power Apps, Power Automate), SharePoint, RPA
Analytics & Visualization: KPI Development, Dashboard Design, Performance Metrics
Risk Management: RCSA Facilitation, Control Design, Compliance Integration
